git.commitMessage:
fix: Player stats tracking + Bot management UX + Enhanced game replay

Fixed critical bugs and enhanced replay functionality.

CRITICAL BUG FIXES:
1. Player Stats Tracking (Red/Brown Zeros, Trumps, Card Play Times)
   - All stats were using socket.id instead of player names
   - Socket IDs are volatile (change on reconnect)
   - Caused all special card tracking to return 0
   - Fixed: Use player names consistently throughout stats tracking
   - Affected: roundStats initialization, card play tracking, stat retrieval

2. Bot Management Modal Flickering
   - Missing stopPropagation on content div
   - Added onClick={onClose} to overlay
   - Added onClick={(e) => e.stopPropagation()} to content

3. Bot Management Display Cleanup
   - Removed unnecessary rules info box
   - Removed points and trick points display
   - Simplified to show only name, team, and bot status

GAME REPLAY ENHANCEMENTS:
1. Trick-by-Trick Navigation
   - Previous/Next trick buttons
   - Jump to specific trick with timeline selector
   - Current trick highlighted with yellow border

2. Auto-Playback System
   - Play/Pause button
   - Speed controls: 0.5x, 1x, 2x
   - Auto-advances through tricks and rounds
   - Pauses at end of game

3. Timeline View
   - Visual trick selector (T1, T2, T3, T4)
   - Color-coded: yellow (current), blue (played), gray (upcoming)
   - Click any trick to jump directly

4. Player Stats Integration
   - New "Game History" tab in PlayerStatsModal
   - Shows last 20 games with win/loss status
   - Displays team, score, tricks, points, bet info
   - "View Replay" button for finished games

Files Changed:
- backend/src/index.ts: Fixed stat tracking to use player names
- frontend/src/components/GameReplay.tsx: Added playback controls
- frontend/src/components/PlayerStatsModal.tsx: Added history tab
- frontend/src/components/BotManagementPanel.tsx: Fixed flickering, cleaned UI
- CLAUDE.md: Already documented player name principle
